title: Keycloak 20.0.1 released
content: To download the release go to .   MIGRATION FROM 19.0  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database. If you are not on the previous release refer to for a complete list of migration changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   BUGS   * [Urgent] weird charachters when saving Authenticators config keycloak-ui    section/authentication  * NullPointerException when importing a json keycloak import-export  * JPA Map store JDBC transactions not rolled back on Hibernate transaction    rollback when running in Quarkus keycloak storage  * kc.bat fails with ClassNotFoundException keycloak dist/quarkus   UPGRADING  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database and check the for anything that may have changed.
